text: Container for a CVEX shader implementation.
The CVEX Shader VOP is basically the VOP representation of the
. It is a container for a CVEX shader that can be wired to VOP procedurals with CVEX shader inputs, such as Fur.
All parameter VOPs created in the CVEX Shader produce new inputs.

title: CVEX Shader
summary: Container for a CVEX shader implementation.
